https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r7JXgTZ7ZeosfhpSDKcDS8DWl4q.jpg Hoping to find his place in the world, Boris Babaev, an Orthodox Jew from Tajikistan, moves to Poland, where he becomes an accidental hero for young Polish Jews. Apart in the World
